Class SampleDataset

java.lang.Object
kp.SampleDataset
public class SampleDataset extends Object
The sample dataset creator.

The standard dataset:

  1. Department
    1. Employee
    2. Employee
    3. Employee
  2. Department
    1. Employee
    2. Employee
    3. Employee
